cn.trinea.android.common.service

接口 FileNameRule

  • 所有超级接口:
    java.io.Serializable
    所有已知实现类:
    FileNameRuleCurrentTime, FileNameRuleImageUrl

    public interface FileNameRule
extends java.io.Serializable
    File name rule, used when saving images in ImageSDCardCache
    作者:
    Trinea 2012-7-6

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.lang.String getFileName(java.lang.String imageUrl)
      get file name, include suffix, it's optional to include folder.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getFileName

        java.lang.String getFileName(java.lang.String imageUrl)
        get file name, include suffix, it's optional to include folder.
        参数:
        imageUrl - the url of image
        返回:
